title: AI Specialist
description:
AIWave Technologies is Hiring an AI Specialist (Full-Time)

AIWave Technologies, a Seoul-based AI firm, develops solutions for clients in healthcare and finance. We’re seeking a AI Specialist to build AI applications.

About the Role
You’ll develop AI models to enhance client operations.

Your Tasks

  • Build AI models with TensorFlow.
    - Refine algorithms.
    - Integrate AI solutions.
    - Optimize performance.
    - Document solutions.
    - Conduct testing.
    - Stay updated on AI trends.
    - Train clients on AI.
    - Support AI strategy.
    - Participate in code reviews.

Qualifications
We need candidates with 2–3 years of experience in AI, proficient in TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Python. Cloud platform experience and problem-solving skills are essential. A Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field is required.

Why AIWave?
We’re innovators in AI. Our hybrid work model and training support growth in a collaborative environment.

Perks
Health insurance
Commuter allowance
20 days of annual leave
AI training budget
AI tools access
Team events

Apply Now
Join AIWave Technologies to shape AI’s future. Submit your application today!

#AIWaveCareers #AI #HiringNow
